name: Carports
description: Premium Japanese aluminum carports engineered for durability. Single, double, and triple configurations; residential and commercial; roof-mount and freestanding. Manufactured by Sankyo-Tateyama (Takaoka, Japan)—corrosion resistant and maintenance-free.
descriptionLong: KunkelWorks is the official distributor of authentic Japanese aluminum carports. Systems are meticulously crafted, tested, and inspected for shape, surface, color, and assembly. Resilient to humidity, rain, sea salt, and intense sunshine. Popular series include the PJR (soft curved roof, versatile for cantilever/double/triple), ELN (curved roofline on gutter side for extra shade and rain block), and many others. Side panels, roof mounting, and hurricane anchors available.
finishes: Anodized and coated aluminum; color options vary by series
priceNote: Typical ranges by configuration (e.g. PJR cantilever ~$5k–$7k, double ~$8k–$10k, triple ~$11k–$13k; ELN in similar ranges). Contact for exact pricing.
attribution: Product info from KunkelWorks (kunkelworks.com). For detailed specs and pricing: info@kunkelworks.com.
